airmass.comment: The mass of air in an atmospheric layer.
airmass.long_name: Vertically Integrated Mass Content of Air in Layer

aoanh.comment: Fixed surface layer mixing ratio over 30o-50oN (0 ppbv), uniform fixed source (at all levels) everywhere else (source is unspecified but must be constant in space and time and documented). Note that the source could be 1yr/yr, so the tracer concentration provides mean age in years. For method using linearly increasing tracer include a method attribute: 'linearly increasing tracer'For method using uniform source (1yr/yr) include a method attribute: 'uniform source'

c2h2.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

c2h6.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

c3h6.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

c3h8.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

cdnc.comment: Cloud Droplet Number Concentration in liquid water clouds.

ch3coch3.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction 'mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y', where X is a material constituent of Y. A chemical species denoted by X may be described by a single term such as 'nitrogen' or a phrase such as 'nox_expressed_as_nitrogen'. Acetone is an organic molecule with the chemical formula CH3CH3CO. The IUPAC name for acetone is propan-2-one. Acetone is a member of the group of organic compounds known as ketones. There are standard names for the ketone group as well as for some of the individual species.

ch4.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

co.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

co2.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

dms.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

ec550aer.comment: Aerosol volume extinction coefficient at 550nm wavelength.

emilnox.comment: Integrate the NOx production for lightning over model layer. proposed name: tendency_of_atmosphere_mass_content_of_nox_from_lightning

hcho.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

hcl.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.  The chemical formula of hydrogen chloride is HCl.

hno3.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

isop.comment: Mole fraction of isoprene in air.

lossco.long_name: Monthly Loss of Atmospheric Carbon Monoxide

lossn2o.long_name: Monthly Loss of Atmospheric Nitrous Oxide

mmraerh2o.comment: Mass fraction is used in the construction mass_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y. It means the ratio of the mass of X to the mass of Y (including X). 'Aerosol' means the system of suspended liquid or solid particles in air (except cloud droplets) and their carrier gas, the air itself. 'Ambient_aerosol' means that the aerosol is measured or modelled at the ambient state of pressure, temperature and relative humidity that exists in its immediate environment. 'Ambient aerosol particles' are aerosol particles that have taken up ambient water through hygroscopic growth. The extent of hygroscopic growth depends on the relative humidity and the composition of the particles.

mmrbc.comment: Dry mass fraction of black carbon aerosol particles in air.

mmrdust.comment: Dry mass fraction of dust aerosol particles in air.

mmrnh4.comment: Dry mass fraction of ammonium aerosol particles in air.

mmrno3.comment: Dry mass fraction of nitrate aerosol particles in air.

mmroa.comment: We recommend a scale factor of POM=1.4*OC, unless your model has more detailed info available.
mmroa.long_name: Total Organic Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio

mmrpm1.comment: Mass fraction atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 1 micrometers

mmrpm10.comment: Mass fraction atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 10 micrometers

mmrpm2p5.comment: Mass fraction atmospheric particulate compounds with an aerodynamic diameter of less than or equal to 2.5 micrometers

mmrso4.comment: Dry mass of sulfate (SO4) in aerosol particles as a fraction of air mass.

mmrsoa.comment: Mass fraction in the atmosphere of secondary organic aerosols (particulate organic matter formed within the atmosphere from gaseous precursors; dry mass).
mmrsoa.long_name: Secondary Organic Aerosol Mass Mixing Ratio

mmrss.comment: Mass fraction in the atmosphere of sea salt aerosol (dry mass).

n2o.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.   The chemical formula of  nitrous oxide is N2O.

nh50.comment: Fixed surface layer mixing ratio over 30o-50oN (100ppbv), uniform fixed 50-day exponential decay.

no.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

no2.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

o3.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

o3loss.comment: ONLY provide the sum of the following reactions: (i) O(1D)+H2O; (ii) O3+HO2; (iii) O3+OH; (iv) O3+alkenes (isoprene, ethene,...)

o3prod.comment: ONLY provide the sum of all the HO2/RO2 + NO reactions (as k*[HO2]*[NO])

o3ste.comment: Ozone tracer intended to map out strat-trop exchange (STE) of ozone. Set to ozone in the stratosphere, then destroyed in the troposphere using the ozone chemical loss rate. Please specify the tropopause definition used
o3ste.long_name: Stratospheric Ozone Tracer Volume Mixing Ratio

oh.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

pan.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

photo1d.long_name: Photolysis Rate of Ozone (O3) to Excited Atomic Oxygen (the Singlet D State, O1D)

so2.comment: Mole fraction is used in the construction mole_fraction_of_X_in_Y, where X is a material constituent of Y.

tntrl.comment: Tendency of air temperature due to longwave radiative heating
tntrl.long_name: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Longwave Radiative Heating

tntrs.comment: Tendency of air temperature due to shortwave radiative heating
tntrs.long_name: Tendency of Air Temperature Due to Shortwave Radiative Heating

ua.comment: Zonal wind (positive in a eastward direction).

va.comment: Meridional wind (positive in a northward direction).

wa.comment: A velocity is a vector quantity. 'Upward' indicates a vector component which is positive when directed upward (negative downward). Upward air velocity is the vertical component of the 3D air velocity vector. The standard name downward_air_velocity may be used for a vector component with the opposite sign convention.
